com.receiver2d.engine

Class Receiver2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.receiver2d.engine.Receiver2D

  • public class Receiver2D
extends Object
    This is the main class, where the engine can be started and managed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int RENDER_FPS_CAP
      The frequency limit for the engine's rendering update
      static boolean running
      Whether or not the program is running.
      static long START_TIME
      Global program start time TODO: see LWJGL's Sys.getTime() and Sys.getTimerResolution() to integrate
      static ThreadManager threads
      A manager for the engine's running threads

    • Method Summary

      Gets the currently-loaded world.

      Loads a world into the world queue.
      static void start()
      Starts the game engine.
      static void stop()
      Stops the game engine.
      static void unLoadWorld()
      Unloads the current world from the game.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • running

        public static boolean running
        Whether or not the program is running. When false, all currently-running threads will automatically close.

      • START_TIME

        public static final long START_TIME
        Global program start time TODO: see LWJGL's Sys.getTime() and Sys.getTimerResolution() to integrate

      • RENDER_FPS_CAP

        public static final int RENDER_FPS_CAP
        The frequency limit for the engine's rendering update
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • threads

        public static ThreadManager threads
        A manager for the engine's running threads

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static void start()
        Starts the game engine.

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        Stops the game engine.

      • queueWorld

        public static boolean queueWorld(World world)
        Loads a world into the world queue. If the queue size is nonzero, the world will be pushed to the top of the queue without being loaded.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to load into the queue
        Returns:
        Whether or not the world loading was successful

      • getLoadedWorld

        public static World getLoadedWorld()
        Gets the currently-loaded world.
        Returns:
        A world

      • unLoadWorld

        public static void unLoadWorld()
        Unloads the current world from the game.
